channel.title: Compiling help
channel.description: hey guys i need help compiling, cause im all crazy, and this compiling thing says i dont have java, but i do have java, i have jdk6u20, and jre!!! im crazy hehe :):(

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @teh_war_of_noobs teh war of noobs
item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

Right click the compiler, and click “edit”, it may look something like this:

@echo off echo My Compiler ownz title My Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

If that is the case, GET RID OF IT, and change it to this if you have a 474:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/cellkyborg/server/*.java "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/cellkyborg/RSInstances/*.java pause
Paste this code if you have a 525!

@echo off echo Compiling rs2hd/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/*.java echo rs2hd/*.java complete "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/admin/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/skills/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/event/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/net/codec/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packetbuilder/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/commands/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/*.java pause

This if you have a 508:

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javacpl.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java pause

And i dont know the code for a 317! anyways you can find them on google hope this helped

OtherWise, usually where it says “jdk1.6.0_” etc… the last digits your going to want to change to 20, which is currently your java version.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @ipwnurgfsass ipwnurgfsass
item.description:
@ipwnurgfsass wrote:

right click compile.bat and edit, change the jdk version to the one you have

this is code for 317 compiler

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
